gate.composite
Class OffsetDetails

java.lang.Object
  gate.composite.OffsetDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OffsetDetails
extends Object
implements Serializable

OffsetDetails is a utility class that is used by composite document to keep the mapping of annotations in their original documents to the ones copied in the composite document.

Author:
niraj
See Also:
